column2: "Na Samuel n'asɛm dur Israel nyinara nkyɛn. Afei Israel tui kɔr Filistiafo do dɛ wɔnye hɔn rokɔko
column3: na wɔkɛkyeer nsera wɔ Ebenezer nkyɛn: na Filistiafo no bɛkyeer nsera wɔ Afek:"

column2: "Na Filistiafo no kɛbaa mpasuar hyiaa Israel: na wɔdze kɔbɔɔ enyim no
column3: Filistiafo no bɔɔ Israel gui: na wokum dɔm a wɔwɔ akono no mu nyimpa bɛyɛ mpemanan."

column2: "Na ɔman no baa nseraban no mu no
column3: Israel mpanyimfo no see dɛ
column4: Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na EWURADZE abɔ hɛn egu ndɛ wɔ Filistiafo enyim yi? Wɔmma yɛnkɛfa EWURADZE n'ahyɛmudaka no wɔ Siloh mbra hɛn nkyɛn
column6: na ɔmbɛgye hɛn mfi hɛn atamfo nsamu."

column2: "Nna ɔman no somae ma wɔkɔr Siloh
column3: na wɔkɛfaa dɔm EWURADZE a ɔtse Kerubim do no
column4: n'ahyɛmudaka no wɔ hɔ bae: na Eli ne mbabanyin beenu no
column6: nna wɔnye Nyankopɔn n'ahyɛmudaka no wɔ hɔ."

column2: "Na aber a EWURADZE n'ahyɛmudaka baa nseraban no mu no
column3: Israel nyinara dze enyigye kɛse bɔɔ ose

column2: "Na aber a Filistiafo no tsee esebɔ dede no
column3: wɔkaa dɛ
column4: Hebriwfo asese mu esebɔ kɛse dede yi ase nye dɛn? Na wɔtsee ase dɛ EWURADZE n'adakaa no aba nseraban no mu."

column2: "Na Filistiafo no suroi
column3: na wɔsee dɛ
column4: Nyame bi aba nseraban no mu. Na wɔsee dɛ
column5: Yendue! Dɛm adze yi bi nnsii pɛn ara da na ndɛ."

column2: "Yendue! Woana beyi hɛn efi enyame akatakyi yi nsamu? Iyinom nye enyame a wɔdze ɔyardɔm ahorow nyinara kum Egyptfo wɔ sar no do no."
"Hom nhyɛ dzen
column3: na hom nyɛ hom ho dɛ mbarimba
column5: amma hom aannyɛ nkowaa amma Hebriwfo no
column6: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn wɔayɛ ama hom no: hom nyɛ hom ho dɛ mbarimba na hom nko."

column2: "Na Filistiafo no koe
column3: na wɔbɔɔ Israel gui
column5: nyimpa biara kɔr n'asesee mu: na ɔyɛɛ ɔko kɛse dodoodow; osiandɛ Israel mu nyimpa a wɔnam anamɔnmu dɔm mpemeduasa totɔree."

column2: "Na Nyankopɔn n'adakaa no
column3: so wɔgyee; na Eli ne mbabanyin beenu no

column2: "Na Benjaminnyi bi fi dɔm no mu tutuu mbirika dze n'atar ntsetsewee baa Siloh da no ara
column3: nna dɛtse gu n'etsifi."

column2: "Na aber a ɔbae no
column3: hwɛ
column4: nna Eli tse n'egua do wɔ ɔkwan nkyɛn rohwɛ; osiandɛ n'akoma tui wɔ Nyankopɔn adakaa no ho. Na ɔbarimba no baa kurow no mu na ɔbɔbɔɔ n'amandzɛɛ no

column2: "Na Eli tsee nkekamu na dede no
column3: obisaa dɛ
column4: Na gyigyeegye dede yi ase nye dɛn? Nna ɔbarimba no kaa noho ntsɛmara

column2: "Nna Eli edzi mfe eduokron awɔtwe; na n'enyiwa ayɛ kusukusu
column3: ma onnhu adze."

column2: "Na ɔbarimba no see Eli dɛ
column3: Emi nye nyia ofi dɔm no mu bae no
column4: na ndɛ ara na mifi dɔm no mu muguanee. Na Eli bisaa dɛ

column2: "Na nyia ɔdze amandzɛɛ no bae no buae
column3: na ɔsee dɛ
column4: Israel egu wɔ Filistiafo no enyim
column5: na ɔman no so atotɔr pii
column6: na wo mbabanyin beenu no so
column9: na Nyankopɔn n'adakaa no so wɔagye."

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ
column3: ɔbɔɔ Nyankopɔn n'adakaa no dzin no
column4: Eli fii n'egua no do hwee n'ekyir daadze wɔ abotsen no nkyɛn na no kɔn mu bui
column6: na ɔyɛ dur. Nna oebu Israel atsɛn mfe eduanan."

column2: "Nna n'asew
column3: Finehas ne yer no
column4: onyinsen ma n'awoo rubodu: na ɔtsee amandzɛɛ no dɛ wɔafa Nyankopɔn n'adakaa no
column5: na n'asew na no kun ewuwu no
column7: na awoko yaw baa no do

column2: "Na orubowu no
column3: mbaa a wogyina ne nkyɛn no see no dɛ
column4: Mma nnsuro: na awo banyin. Naaso oemmbua

column2: "Na ɔtoo abofra no dzin Ikabod  see dɛ
column3: Enyimnyam no efi Israel kɔ: osian Nyankopɔn n'adakaa no a wɔagye na n'asew na no kun no ntsi."
column4: "#4.21 IKABOD: Asekyerɛ nye: Enyimnyam no wɔ hen?"

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Enyimnyam no efi Israel kɔ; osiandɛ wɔagye Nyankopɔn n'adakaa no."
